title: Drawing, 1969-165-176, 1940
medium: Brush and red and green gouache; graphite on newsprint
signed: Lower right in graphite: AH Girard / June 16, 1940
provenance: From the office of Alexander H. Girard
description: Evenly spaced Chess pieces: King, Queen and Knight in red, Rook in green, Pawn in green and red
